Text:
A few days later, Gamma invites Cid to meet her near
the Abyss Woods.
It's pretty rare for me to be summoned by Gamma.

But why the middle of the woods, of all places?
We always meet at Mitsugoshi.

But I dig mysterious gestures like this. I'm kind
of excited.

In her letter, it said, "I have an important thing to
tell you." I wonder what she meant by that. Maybeâ€”

My lord, the time has come to implement the
Super Strategy.
So, the moment has finally come.

The organization has grown beyond expectations, so we
are moving to the next phase of the plan.
...Very well. But let us tread carefully.
(...A secret strategy? Orâ€”)
We have a list of potential new members.

The Seven Shadows will be expanded to 12 members
next month. Please help us select the five new members,
my lord.
Hmm...fascinating. Gotta catch 'em all, huh.

(...Or something like that. I'm open to anyone who
wants to tag along with a shadowbroker.)

But being called the 12 Shadows sounds pretty lame.
Maybe the Squad of 12 or the 12 Swordswomen... Nah.
We could call the new five "Pentagram" or something...

It's got the right flavor, but I'm starting to sound
a bit delusional.
Ah...but I guess it's not always good newsâ€”
This is the place...but there's no one here.
Huh? There's a letter here.

"Instead of being the president of Mitsugoshi, I've
always wanted to be an author."

"So I will close Mitsugoshi. I wish you all the best,
my lord. From Gamma."

Hmmm, I dislike that kind of dreary turn of events...
It brings back old, traumatic memories...

But it's also true that I've been relying on Gamma
for money lately. I need to depend on myself. I don't
want to be a selfish princess's slave again.
Cid's joyful expression dims as he lets out a sigh.
Well. I guess I won't know until I get there.

Letting his imagination run wild with various
scenarios, Cid reaches his destination.
A marvelous building stands alone in the forest.
Was this even here before? ...Ah, whatever.

Without giving it much thought, Cid goes inside.
And thenâ€”

He opens the door and sees something he never has
before... A spectacular and dazzling party hall.
Where am I...?
The Seven Shadows stand in front of him.
(No way... I got a bad feeling about thisâ€”)
My lord...
I-I'm not mentally ready for this yetâ€”
Thank you for everything!

After Gamma, the other Seven Shadows take turns
thanking him.
...Huh? What's going on?

Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule
to come here today, my lord.

We organized a surprise anniversary party to show
our thanks to you!

...Right. But I'm the one who should be saying thanks.
You really didn't have to go out of your way to do all
of this.
Is this place new? I don't remember seeing it.
Yes. Zeta, Eta, and Delta built and set it up.
I-Is that right? You guys did a fantastic job.

(Right...these kind of things are always more fun
when you can help prepare. Just like with school
festivals, setting things up is actually the best
part, right?)

(Damn, If I had known, I would've helped out!
Don't leave me out, everyone!)
Hmm? Speaking of Delta, where is she?

I asked her to get some ingredients, but it seems
to be taking her longer than expected...
She said she'd be back before the party started...
I hope she comes back soon.

(Is Delta's plan like an "I got invited to a friend-I-
don't-like-much's birthday, but I don't want to look
bad so I'll arrive when it's about to end" bare
minimum kind of thing?)

(No, that's not it. I'm sure she doesn't hate me
like that. I'm just being negative.)

I am deeply sorry for this... But the rest of us will
continue the party, so don't worry.

Th-Thanks... Still, it's amazing you prepared such
a fantastic party from scratch.

Eta and I were in charge of building and decorating.
We went for a relaxed vibe focusing on aspects from
each country I've been to. Do you like it?
Yeah, I love it. Great atmosphere.
Mission accomplished!
Heheh.
Here's some food and drink for you, Shadow.
Huh? Oh, thanks.

Gamma and I will be at your service today, so don't
be afraid to let us know if you need anything.

We also have other types of dishes, so please let us
know if you would like to try them!

At my service... Got it. I see you two are wearing
different outfits than usual.

(I've seen this design somewhere before... Is this
what happens when you try to highlight a woman's
beauty? Did I teach them this?)
It's perfect for you two, very mature.
I'm very flattered...by your kind words...!

Gamma, calm down. If you get too excited,
you'll trip.
...I-I've always thought of myself as mature anyway.

A-Anyways, say something about the food too. It was
made specially for you.

Oh yeah, I am pretty hungry. What is there to eat?
I'll try some right now.

Huh? Are these...the names of the dishes or
something? Hmm...
"Baby Shrimp and Fan Mussel Duet: Starry Night".

And over here is... "Beef and Pasta: A Perfect
Harmony of Flavors".

What do you think, my lord? I-I named them. I thought
it would make the food look more appetizing...
Beta...you came up with this?!
Y-Yes! D-Do you not like it or something?!

(I can't believe it. The Beta that has been making
a living with stolen ideas has made something
original...!)

(The food and the titles don't quite match, but she's
showing progress. I...I...!)
I'm extremely impressed!
R-Really?!

I-I'm thrilled you like it that much! Lucky me!
Heehee...!
What's with that creepy laugh of yours?
Hee hee hee! Hah hah hah!
You're a lost cause... I have to act quickly...
Ah, Epsilon. You made most of this food, right?
Y-Yes! That's exactly right!
...Did I mention that before or something?

The food tastes just the way I like it, exactly like
how you prepare my favorite tea. *munch*
I-I had no idea your taste buds were so precise...!

On top of that, you're the best cook here, Epsilon.
Everything tastes amazing. *munch*...

You remember the taste of my cooking...?! I'm beyond
words! Oh...!

(Well, the way the volume is "enhanced" was truly
the deciding factor...)
You two must be happy that he is enjoying your food.
Hee hee hee! Hah hah hah!
I wonder if those two will snap out of it later...?
I highly doubt it...
Y-You won't believe this!
Delta?! Where have you been?!
L-Lecture me later! Listenâ€”!
The reason Delta came charging in so quickly isâ€”
